document.full_text: a new survey of patients at dermatologists' offices sends a clear message to doctors about their attire: scrap the necktie, but don't lose the white coat just yet.
document.title: note to dermatologists: the necktie is out
lines_and_colors: a new survey of patients at dermatologists' offices sends a clear message to doctors about their attire: scrap the necktie, but don't lose the white coat just yet.
